match.title: 1st ODI
match.statusText: South Africa won by 9 wickets (with 79 balls remaining)

image.caption: An overview of the Zohur Ahmed Chowdhury Stadium
image.longCaption: An overview of the Zohur Ahmed Chowdhury Stadium, Bangladesh A v England, March 7, 2010

match.hoursInfo: 09.30 start, First Session 09.30-13.00 Interval 13.00-13.45, Second Session 13.45-17.15

dismissalText.commentary: Tamim Iqbal c Morkel b Harris 82 (98b 9x4 1x6 126m) SR: 83.67

dismissalComment.html: Tamim holes out to long-on. Valiant knock comes to an end. He charged out to Harris and heaved straight to the fielder. Out for 82. Well played but perhaps, he could have carried on. Wrong time to get out.

headshotImage.caption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.longCaption: Andre Nel player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Graeme Smith player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Graeme Smith player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Abdur Razzak c Smith b Nel 15 (12b 0x4 1x6 12m) SR: 125

dismissalComment.html: low full toss, swiped low to covers where Smith takes it. The batsman thinks it might have bounced, the two umpires confer and he is given out. They don't refer it to third umpire. Smith claimed the catch. Replays don't confirm or deny it. Akhtar Ali Khan, on air, believes it bounced. I will wait for another replay to confirm his doubt.

headshotImage.caption: Andre Nel player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Andre Nel player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: 100th ODI wicket for Nel. Fullish, outside off stump, moving away and Nafees goes back and across and tries to cut - not the length for it - and edges it behind. Nel is ecstatic and his team-mates rush to congratulate him.

headshotImage.caption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: low full toss, swiped low to covers where Smith takes it. The batsman thinks it might have bounced, the two umpires confer and he is given out. They don't refer it to third umpire. Smith claimed the catch. Replays don't confirm or deny it. Akhtar Ali Khan, on air, believes it bounced. I will wait for another replay to confirm his doubt.

headshotImage.caption: Shahadat Hossain player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shahadat Hossain player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: yorker fetches him another wicket. It crashed into the front boot in front of leg and middle. The umpire Enamul reckons it would have clipped the leg. Hmm..

headshotImage.caption: Shakib Al Hasan headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: Shakib Al Hasan headshot

dismissalComment.html: caught at midwicket. The pitch is getting increasingly slower and stroke play is getting difficult. He came down the track, trying to drive to long-on but couldn't reach the pitch of the delivery that stopped on him a touch and sent it straight to the fielder.

dismissalText.commentary: Zunaed Siddique c Harris b Langeveldt 6 (24b 0x4 0x6 29m) SR: 25

dismissalComment.html: First wicket is down. Siddique is back in the hut. Banged in short and he top-edged a pull to Harris, who ran forward from mid-on to take a comfortable catch.

dismissalText.commentary: Shahriar Nafees c de Villiers b Nel 12 (19b 2x4 0x6 27m) SR: 63.15

dismissalComment.html: 100th ODI wicket for Nel. Fullish, outside off stump, moving away and Nafees goes back and across and tries to cut - not the length for it - and edges it behind. Nel is ecstatic and his team-mates rush to congratulate him.

dismissalText.commentary: Mohammad Ashraful lbw b Morkel 8 (24b 1x4 0x6 32m) SR: 33.33

dismissalComment.html: trapped by a yorker. Full and on the middle and leg stump line, swung in late  to evade the drive. Ash reckons it would have missed the leg stump but Umpire Enamul believes it would have crashed into the leg stump as the batsman had not taken a great forward stride.

dismissalText.commentary: Raqibul Hasan c Botha b Langeveldt 15 (42b 0x4 0x6 53m) SR: 35.71

dismissalComment.html: what a soft dismissal. Driven straight to mid-off. Full in length, outside off stump, he stretched forward and drove straight to the fielder.

headshotImage.caption: Johan Botha player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Johan Botha player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Mosharraf Hossain lbw b Botha 8 (24b 0x4 0x6 24m) SR: 33.33

dismissalComment.html: trapped in front. Quicker one from round the stumps and he was caught dead plumb in front. The bat was held behind the pad and Hossain's misery ends.

dismissalText.commentary: Herschelle Gibbs lbw b Shakib Al Hasan 57 (84b 8x4 1x6 123m) SR: 67.85

dismissalComment.html: caught in front by an armer that kept low. Gibbs rocked back to pull but was undone by the lack of bounce.

headshotImage.longCaption: Andre Nel player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Paul Harris player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Paul Harris player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Graeme Smith player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Graeme Smith player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: Smith gets his hundred and SA seal the win. His 7th ODI ton. He came down the track, was beaten in the flight but lunged forward to chip it over the infield and it rolls over to the long-on boundary.

commentPostTextItems.html: Bangladesh crash to another loss after their batsmen turn in yet another poor performance.  They won the toss, batted but only eked out 178. Smith and Gibbs shared a 143-run opening partnership to charge the visitors to a facile win. That's it from us. Thanks for logging in. Bye.

commentTextItems.html: sweeps this time but sends it again to that man at square leg
shuffles to the off side and whips a delivery to square leg, but straight to the fielder
spins in from outside off and he is struck on the pad
leans forward, on drives to left of short midwicket where Ashraful makes a neat diving stop
fires it quick, at the blockhole, dug out to the leg side

headshotImage.caption: HM Amla headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: HM Amla headshot

headshotImage.caption: Graeme Smith player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Graeme Smith player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentPreTextItems.html: Smith needs one run  for his ton and SA need 3 to win. Amla on strike.

commentTextItems.html: comes down the track, the bowler pushes it flat and its turned past square leg
tossed up full outside off, Smith goes for a cut - perhaps, not the length for it - and misses
stays back to pull a short of length delivery to right of deep midwicket
spins from outside off, beats the intended sweep and goes down leg
he allows SMith to take the strike next over by offering the full face of the bat in defense. Smith needs 4 to get to his ton

headshotImage.caption: HM Amla headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: HM Amla headshot

headshotImage.caption: Graeme Smith player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Graeme Smith player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Shakib Al Hasan headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: Shakib Al Hasan headshot

commentTextItems.html: stays back and pushes a spinning delivery to point
leans forward to push it to backward point
Amla gets four of 'em. He rocked back and cut to cover boundary. SA need 6 to win, Smith needs 4 of 'em to get to his ton but he is not on strike.
on the stumps, worked to midwicket

commentTextItems.html: There he goes. He just lunged forward and swung a tossed-up delivery over the long-on fielder

headshotImage.longCaption: Andre Nel player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Graeme Smith player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Graeme Smith player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Abdur Razzak c Smith b Nel 15 (12b 0x4 1x6 12m) SR: 125

dismissalComment.html: low full toss, swiped low to covers where Smith takes it. The batsman thinks it might have bounced, the two umpires confer and he is given out. They don't refer it to third umpire. Smith claimed the catch. Replays don't confirm or deny it. Akhtar Ali Khan, on air, believes it bounced. I will wait for another replay to confirm his doubt.

headshotImage.longCaption: Andre Nel player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Shahadat Hossain lbw b Nel 0 (1b 0x4 0x6 2m) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: yorker fetches him another wicket. It crashed into the front boot in front of leg and middle. The umpire Enamul reckons it would have clipped the leg. Hmm..

headshotImage.longCaption: AB de Villiers headshot

dismissalText.commentary: Syed Rasel c de Villiers b Morkel 0 (6b 0x4 0x6 6m) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: the outside edge is taken and Bangladesh restricted for 178. Full in length, angling away and he tried to drive on the up and is gone.

headshotImage.caption: Andre Nel player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Andre Nel player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: 100th ODI wicket for Nel. Fullish, outside off stump, moving away and Nafees goes back and across and tries to cut - not the length for it - and edges it behind. Nel is ecstatic and his team-mates rush to congratulate him.

headshotImage.caption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: low full toss, swiped low to covers where Smith takes it. The batsman thinks it might have bounced, the two umpires confer and he is given out. They don't refer it to third umpire. Smith claimed the catch. Replays don't confirm or deny it. Akhtar Ali Khan, on air, believes it bounced. I will wait for another replay to confirm his doubt.

headshotImage.caption: Shahadat Hossain player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shahadat Hossain player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: yorker fetches him another wicket. It crashed into the front boot in front of leg and middle. The umpire Enamul reckons it would have clipped the leg. Hmm..

headshotImage.caption: Charl Langeveldt player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Charl Langeveldt player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Junaid Siddique player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Junaid Siddique player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: First wicket is down. Siddique is back in the hut. Banged in short and he top-edged a pull to Harris, who ran forward from mid-on to take a comfortable catch.

headshotImage.caption: Raqibul Hasan player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Raqibul Hasan player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: what a soft dismissal. Driven straight to mid-off. Full in length, outside off stump, he stretched forward and drove straight to the fielder.

headshotImage.caption: Albie Morkel player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Albie Morkel player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: trapped by a yorker. Full and on the middle and leg stump line, swung in late  to evade the drive. Ash reckons it would have missed the leg stump but Umpire Enamul believes it would have crashed into the leg stump as the batsman had not taken a great forward stride.

headshotImage.caption: Syed Rasel player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Syed Rasel player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: the outside edge is taken and Bangladesh restricted for 178. Full in length, angling away and he tried to drive on the up and is gone.

headshotImage.caption: Johan Botha player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Johan Botha player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: trapped in front. Quicker one from round the stumps and he was caught dead plumb in front. The bat was held behind the pad and Hossain's misery ends.

headshotImage.caption: Paul Harris player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Paul Harris player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Shakib Al Hasan headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: Shakib Al Hasan headshot

dismissalComment.html: caught at midwicket. The pitch is getting increasingly slower and stroke play is getting difficult. He came down the track, trying to drive to long-on but couldn't reach the pitch of the delivery that stopped on him a touch and sent it straight to the fielder.

headshotImage.caption: Tamim Iqbal headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: Tamim Iqbal headshot

dismissalComment.html: Tamim holes out to long-on. Valiant knock comes to an end. He charged out to Harris and heaved straight to the fielder. Out for 82. Well played but perhaps, he could have carried on. Wrong time to get out.

notes: Bangladesh innings
Power Play 2: Overs 10.1 - 15.0
Bangladesh: 50 runs in 12.4 overs (76 balls), Extras 1
Power Play 3: Overs 15.1 - 20.0
Drinks: Bangladesh - 61/2 in 16.0 overs (Tamim Iqbal 40, Mohammad Ashraful 0)
Tamim Iqbal: 50 off 62 balls, 98 mins (7 x 4)
Bangladesh: 100 runs in 28.2 overs (172 balls), Extras 5
Drinks: Bangladesh - 129/4 in 34.0 overs (Tamim Iqbal 81, Raqibul Hasan 10)
Bangladesh: 150 runs in 42.4 overs (260 balls), Extras 8
South Africa innings
Power Play 2: Overs 10.1 - 15.0
South Africa: 50 runs in 11.3 overs (73 balls), Extras 9
Power Play 3: Overs 15.1 - 20.0
Drinks: South Africa - 72/0 in 18.0 overs (HH Gibbs 24, GC Smith 39)
Drinks: South Africa - 161/1 in 33.0 overs (GC Smith 89, HM Amla 4)
HH Gibbs: 50 off 78 balls, 120 mins (8 x 4)
1st Wicket: 50 runs in 73 balls (HH Gibbs 16, GC Smith 25, Ex 9)
GC Smith: 50 off 64 balls, 90 mins (9 x 4)
GC Smith: 100 off 118 balls, 154 mins (14 x 4, 1 x 6)
1st Wicket: 100 runs in 132 balls (HH Gibbs 39, GC Smith 53, Ex 9)
South Africa: 100 runs in 21.2 overs (132 balls), Extras 9
South Africa: 150 runs in 30.3 overs (188 balls), Extras 10

stories.title: Ashraful defends decision to drop Mortaza
stories.subTitle: Bangladesh v South Africa, 1st ODI, Chittagong
stories.summary: Tamim Iqbal was Bangladesh's top scorer with 82. Disappointed with the result, Tamim said he got out at the wrong moment

stories.title: Bangladesh v South Africa, 1st ODI, Chittagong
stories.subTitle: March 9, 2008
stories.summary: Match home for Bangladesh v South Africa, 1st ODI, Chittagong, March 9, 2008

stories.title: Smith ton seals nine-wicket win
stories.subTitle: Bangladesh v South Africa, 1st ODI, Chittagong
stories.summary: Subcontinental conditions and the presence of three left-arm spinners did nothing to scare off the South Africans as their openers, Graeme Smith and Herschelle Gibbs, added a century opening stand to help South Africa go 1-0 up in the three-match series

stories.title: Bangladesh bank on spinners against new-look South Africa
stories.subTitle: Bangladesh v South Africa, 1st ODI, Chittagong
stories.summary: Spin has always been Bangladesh's potent weapon at home and not surprisingly, Ashraful hinted at continuing with the policy of fielding a three-pronged left-arm spin attack
